meanings.definition: The production of a sense impression relating to one sense or part of the body by stimulation of another sense or part of the body.
meanings.sent1: Her synaestheses allowed her to taste colors and see sounds.
meanings.sent2: His synaestheses made him associate numbers with specific colors.
meanings.sent3: The artist's synaestheses turned the world into a vibrant symphony of sensations.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, the synaestheses created a beautiful dance of interconnected senses.
meanings.sent5: The synaestheses in his mind painted a unique and colorful picture of the world.

meanings.definition: A sensation produced in one modality when a stimulus is applied to another modality, as when the hearing of a certain sound induces the visualization of a certain color.
meanings.sent1: The synaestheses she experienced made music come alive with colors.
meanings.sent2: His synaestheses allowed him to see the world in a kaleidoscope of sensations.
meanings.sent3: The synaestheses of tasting words made the poetry reading quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The synaestheses of the city at night were like a painting in motion.
meanings.sent5: Her synaestheses turned everyday experiences into magical adventures.
